MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 postcode area of Bootle affecting properties in Aintree Road , Somerset Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:42am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:25pm on the 24th December 2020.
